title: Ping
body: idk if this is a bug or not but everytime I have bad ping my champion will stop moving for some reason despite of me clicking anywhere and its weird considering if you have hgih ping you have huge delay but in my case i stop moving and there is not much in game delay as if my ping is fine and idk how to deal with this soulution bc this makes me int feed out of my free will

replies.body: Random or sudden lag spikes can cause you to have input delays, which can result in your game looking weird or stop moving.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) for a quick analysis of what's going wrong.  You will also receive a series of troubleshooting to help with your specific issue.  Let me know if you have any questions!

This depends on if your upload is having issues or your download (As far as I know). 
*Upload = you can't move*
*Download = You don't see others move*
